Author: crankyhedgiebutt
Text: Hmmm I think if you explain it a certain way it won’t make her try to report you or anything. Maybe talk about body image concerns and how that leads to a restrictive eating pattern. Talk about feeling fat and what makes you anxious regarding your ED. I’d talk about WHY you have an ED, not necessarily the ED itself.   She wouldn’t do anything unless you were an obvious threat to yourself.
